title: Image Block
description: A block that renders images in the story

config.title: Config
config.description: Config object for the Image block

isHidden.title: Is Hidden
isHidden.description: If true the block will not be rendered

floatAlignment.title: Float Alignment
floatAlignment.description: Alignment of the image when the block size is 'float'

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: An alternative block to show on mobile devices

placement.title: Media Placement
placement.description: Placement of the image when the block is set to 'fillParent' state (e.g. fit vs fill)

fill.title: Fill
fill.description: Fill properties for the image block

x.title: X Position
x.description: The horizontal focal point of the image the placement type is 'fill'

y.title: Y Position
y.description: The horizontal focal point of the image the placement type is 'fill'

fit.title: Fit
fit.description: Fit properties for the image block. NOTE: This property is required except on early versions of the image block in AGSM.

color.title: Background Color
color.description: A hex value for the color, or a known theme color value (e.g. backgroundColor)

backgroundType.title: Background Type
backgroundType.description: Type of background to display behind media

data.title: Data
data.description: Data object for the Image block

alt.title: Alt Text
alt.description: The alternative text for the image

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: A place for authors to give credit to other creators where it is due

caption.title: Caption Text
caption.description: The caption text for the image

customCaptionColors.title: Custom Caption Colors
customCaptionColors.description: DEPRECATED: This was only needed for Quill; it is no longer being used in Slate. An array of color strings

isExpandable.title: Is Expandable
isExpandable.description: Whether the image can be viewed in an expanded layout. NOTE: This property is only introduced as an override of states.isExpandable when a user toggles the checkbox in the `MediaPropertiesModal`. See README.

image.title: Image Resource ID
image.description: The resource ID for the image resource used by the image block.

expressImage.title: Express Image Resource ID
expressImage.description: The resource ID for the express image (edited image) resource used by the image block.

expressImageDataId.title: Express Image Data Resource ID
expressImageDataId.description: The resource ID for the express image editor data resource used by the image block.

isInFullView.title: Is In Full View
isInFullView.description: Whether the image height is constrained to the screen size or not (inline images)

linkLabel.title: Link Label
linkLabel.description: The text used for the link to the image when used within a floating UI such as a Frame

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL to link to when the image is clicked

title.title: Title (Collection Item)
title.description: The title of image when used in a collection

url.title: Image URL
url.description: The URL of the image, added for images when the image originated from an embed insertion
